phrase1:
A non-custodial crypto wallet is an application that holds the secret key phrase to your account (encrypted with a chosen password) and gives you the ability to do transactions with the account.
Using a blockchain wallet app you can easily manage your accounts, your profile, you can authorize or delegate 3rd party access to your account, execute transactions or sign for different actions.
Basically, you become your own bank.
phrase2:
Please remember to backup your secret key into multiple safe places.
If you damage, loose or your phone get stolen, you will loose access to the only key you have to your account.
If you loose your secret key phrase nobody will ever be able to recover your assets.
